title: 请问服务器粘液科技的GitHub怎么关
author: Mashieo
txt_content:
QQ浏览器截图20200413132917.png (18.93 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-13 13:30 上传





强迫症...一直在后台叭叭叭，

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件应该可以关吧
可以的话能不能把配置文件发一份

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
options.print-out-github-data-retrieving

可以在配置文件中关闭日志输出 曾经应该是这个节点
现在似乎默认是关闭的（而且没有办法修改）

replies.author: Mashieo
replies.txt_content:
DreamVoid 发表于 2020-4-13 13:36
在配置文件应该可以关吧
可以的话能不能把配置文件发一份
config文件对吧..我已经昏了头了
直接发内容吧，我把主体截取下来了
# 
# Name: Slimefun
# Author: Slimefun 4 开发团队, 汉化 By StarWish_
# 
# Do not modify the Config while the Server is running
# otherwise bad things might happen!
# 
# This Plugin also requires CS-CoreLib to run!
# If you don't have it installed already, its going to be
# automatically installed for you
# 
# This Plugin utilises an Auto-Updater. If you want to turn that off,
# simply set options -> auto-update to false
options:
  auto-update: false
  armor-update-interval: 10
  give-guide-on-first-join: true
  print-out-loading: false
  enable-armor-effects: true
  prefix: '&a&lSlimefun &7>'
  auto-save-delay-in-minutes: 10
  show-vanilla-recipes-in-guide: true
  allow-free-creative-research: true
  emerald-enchantment-limit: 2
  research-fireworks: true
guide:
  default-view-book: false
URID:
  info-delay: 3000
  custom-ticker-delay: 12
  enable-tickers: true
items:
  talismans: true
  coolers: true
  backpacks: true

replies.author: 是守望吖~
replies.txt_content: 配置文件把自动更新关掉

replies.author: Matrixchung
replies.txt_content: 正解，关掉自动更新和自动从Github检查即可。
